scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run generate && uv build
scripts.generate: pnpm run generate:py && pnpm run generate:py:fix && pnpm run generate:ts && pnpm run generate:ts:clients
scripts.generate:py: mkdir -p generated/py && uvx --from grpcio-tools==1.71.2 python -m grpc_tools.protoc $npm_package_config_commonPyArgs $npm_package_config_commonArgs
scripts.generate:py:fix: uvx --from protoletariat protol --create-package --in-place -o generated/py protoc $npm_package_config_commonPyArgs --proto-path=. $npm_package_config_commonArgs --protoc-path "uvx --from grpcio-tools==1.71.2 python -m grpc_tools.protoc"
